An Appeal to the Slothful Church 

     It is a mystery that there are not hundreds at work where now there is but one. The heavenly universe is 
                                                                           89
astonished at the apathy, the coldness, the listlessness of those who profess to be sons and daughters of God. In the truth there is a living power.--Testimonies, vol. 9, p. 42.
